Service Details: - Provides qualifying low-income renters and homeowners a free energy evaluation and advice, installation of energy-saving light bulbs, water-efficient showerheads, faucet aerators, exterior door weather-stripping, hot water pipe insulation and an LED nightlight- Some homes may also qualify for an Energy Star certified fridge, insulation in walls, attics and/or crawlspaces and an Energy Star certified natural gas furnace
Eligibility: Must live in a detached home, a townhouse, duplex or mobile home and have an electric account from FortisBC
